title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.2 - Administration of attorneys for children plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.2 - Administration of attorneys for children plan

State Regulations

The attorneys for children plan for
the Second Judicial Department shall be administered by the director of the
attorneys for children program who shall be appointed by the Appellate Division
of the Supreme Court, Second Judicial Department, and supervised by the

Presiding Justice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
679.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
